name: Ancient Souls
text: If this card is sent from the Spell/Trap Zone to the GY, You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. You cannot activate the following effects of "Ancient Souls" in the same chain. You can target 1 other "Ancient" card you control; destroy it, then, if you do, the ATK/DEF of all face-up monsters your opponent controls become half their current ATK/DEF even if this card leaves the field. You can target 1 "Ancient" monster in your GY, Special Summon it in Defense Position, but their effects are negated. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Souls" once per turn.
